title: 202 7 "Breaking Through the Siege! The Going Merry is Recovered!"Transliteration: "Hōimō Toppa! Dakkan Gōingu Merī-gō" (Japanese:包囲網突破!奪還ゴーイングメリー号) Kōnosuke Uda Yoshiyuki Suga September 19, 2004(2004-09-19)[11] —
transformers_text: 202 7 Breaking Through the Siege The Going Merry is Recovered Transliteration H im Topp a Dak kan G in gu Mer g Japanese K no suke Uda Yoshiyuki Suga September 19 2004 2004 09 19 11 The crew meets at the docks and are surrounded by Marines Using Nami as their fake hostage they trick the Marines into letting them back on the Going Merry
tf_idf_text: break siege go merry recover transliteration topp dak kan m japanese suke uda yoshiyuki suga september crew meet dock surround marine use nami fake hostage trick marine let back go merry
